articles.author: Mike Wall
articles.title: Europe's Vega C rocket fails on 2nd-ever mission, 2 satellites lost - Space.com
articles.description: The Vega C was carrying two spacecraft for Airbus' Pléiades Neo Earth-imaging constellation.
articles.content:
The second mission of Europe's new Vega C rocket did not go according to plan.
The medium-lift Vega C lifted off from Europe's Spaceport in Kourou, French Guiana on Tuesday (Dec. 20) at 8:47 p.m. ES… [+3422 chars]

articles.title: Doctors worry more kids may be getting sick with invasive strep A. Here are the facts - OrilliaMatters
articles.description: TORONTO — Some Canadian officials are reporting an uptick in invasive Group A streptococcus infections, echoing the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention in the U.S.

articles.author: Kathy Gibson
articles.title: NASA’s Perseverance rover to begin building Martian sample depot - IT-Online
articles.description: In the coming days, NASA’s Perseverance rover is expected to begin building the first sample depot on another world. This will mark a crucial milestone in the NASA-ESA (European Space Agency) Mars Sample Return campaign, which aims to bring Mars samples to Ea…
